FuncDef: This command instructs BGP to disregard the resolved distance to the BGP next-hop in its decision process for selecting the best route to a destination. When configured in theconfig>router>bgp>best-path-selectioncontext, this command applies to the comparison of two BGP routes with the same NLRI learned from base router BGP peers. When configured in theconfig>service>vprncontext, this command applies to the comparison of two BGP-VPN routes for the same IP prefix imported into the VPRN from the base router BGP instance. When configured in theconfig>service>vprn>bgp>best-path-selectioncontext, this command applies to the comparison of two BGP routes for the same IP prefix learned from VPRN BGP peers.
